The sketch should have one face: **Face 1:** - Loop 1: - Line 1: Starting at (0.0, 0.0) and ending at (0.0495, 0.0) - Line 2: Starting at (0.0495, 0.0) and ending at (0.0495, 0.1845) - Line 3: Starting at (0.0495, 0.1845) and ending at (0.0, 0.1845) - Line 4: Starting at (0.0, 0.1845) and ending at (0.0, 0.0) Scale the 2D sketch by a factor of 0.1845.
